steps.name: When I click the bill pay link
And I enter payee name as Taylor
And I enter address as 143 Kent Avenue
And I enter city as Johannesburg
And I enter state as Johannesburg
And I enter zip code as 4000
And I enter phone number as 0612345678
And I enter account number as 1122334455
And I enter account number as 1122334455
And I click send payment button
And the system displays "Bill Payment Complete"
